query.q: M::`huaweicloud_SYS.DCS`:(AVG(`expires_average`) AS `有过期时间的键总数`) { `account_name` = '#{account_name}' and `instance_name` = '#{instance_name}' }

units.key: 数据集使用内存百分比
units.name: 数据集使用内存百分比

charts.name: 数据集使用内存百分比

query.alias: 数据集使用内存百分比
query.q: M::`huaweicloud_SYS.DCS`:(AVG(`used_memory_dataset_perc_average`) AS `数据集使用内存百分比`) { `account_name` = '#{account_name}' and `instance_name` = '#{instance_name}' }
M::`huaweicloud_SYS.DCS`:(AVG(`blocked_clients_average`) AS `阻塞的客户端数量`) { `account_name` = '#{account_name}' and `instance_name` = '#{instance_name}' }
M::`huaweicloud_SYS.DCS`:(AVG(`connected_clients_average`) AS `活跃的客户端数量`) { `account_name` = '#{account_name}' and `instance_name` = '#{instance_name}' }
M::`huaweicloud_SYS.DCS`:(AVG(`instantaneous_input_kbps_average`) AS `网络瞬时输入流量`) { `account_name` = '#{account_name}' and `instance_name` = '#{instance_name}' }
M::`huaweicloud_SYS.DCS`:(AVG(`instantaneous_output_kbps_average`) AS `网络瞬时输出流量`) { `account_name` = '#{account_name}' and `instance_name` = '#{instance_name}' }
